4317930.name: All Will Rise Demo
4317930.description:
Are you ready to take revenge on the rich and powerful destroying the world? Play the first 3 hours of All Will Rise a role-playing deck-building crime thriller about taking a corrupt billionaire to court for a river's murder. This is a game in development: we are still balancing the game, some art work is placeholder (but entirely human-made) and elements of game design may change by launch.

We hope you enjoy your time with us in Muziris. Please support our small and passionate indie team on Kickstarter.

This Demo will be available till March 22nd 2026.
